bug.author: michaeltimblin
bug.summary: Access Denied error when opening SentenceDetectorDL download link
bug.description: Description The download button on this webpage references this url . An "Access Denied" error is returned when opening the link. Expected Behavior The file should be publicly accessible, and no errors should be returned. Current Behavior The link returns an error. I included an example error below. AccessDenied Access Denied 40CE251A345C3887 iy5P9NMTNm6Pl01jlDtJbwwgYBJHm1U44fz1G/b+YQQ4edvdTujJKDC4l+SKtcnC7dr00GJXxqM= Possible Solution Most likely the file was replaced, and the download link just needs to be updated. Steps to Reproduce Navigate to this webpage Click the download button Context I was just trying to download SentenceDetectorDLModel Your Environment Spark NLP version: N/A Apache NLP version: N/A Java version (java -version) N/A: Setup and installation (Pypi, Conda, Maven, etc.): N/A Operating System and version: N/A Link to your project (if any): N/A

comments.comment: The README in the spark-nlp-models repo <denchmark-link:https://github.com/JohnSnowLabs/spark-nlp-models#english---models>here</denchmark-link> includes a working <denchmark-link:https://s3.amazonaws.com/auxdata.johnsnowlabs.com/public/models/sentence_detector_dl_en_2.6.2_2.4_1600002888450.zip>download link</denchmark-link>
